name: analyze_fatty_acid_composition_by_gc
description: Analyzes fatty acid composition in tissue samples using gas chromatography data.

setup_commands: git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/snap-stanford/Biomni.git /tmp/biomni && cd /tmp/biomni && pip install -e . && rm -rf .git

inputs.name: gc_data_file
inputs.description: Path to the CSV file containing gas chromatography data with columns 'retention_time' and 'peak_area'

inputs.name: tissue_type
inputs.description: Type of tissue sample (e.g., liver, kidney, heart, muscle, adipose)

inputs.name: sample_id
inputs.description: Identifier for the sample being analyzed

inputs.name: output_directory
inputs.description: Directory where result files will be saved

output.description: Research log summarizing the analysis steps and results
